items.sentence: I still don\'t understand what you\'re talking about.
I just don\'t want to have people thinking I\'m weak.
Right now, all I want to do is sleep for a few hours.
Sales have dropped off at every big department store.
She advised him not to borrow money from his friends.
Yesterday, Mary cleaned the house and washed clothes.
This is the most comfortable chair I\'ve ever sat in.
Tom is the one who told me when the meeting would be.
Tom leaned forward and gave Mary a kiss on the cheek.
Tom picked up the bottle, but had trouble opening it.
